text: Tivonge Sacha Rushesha (born 24 July 2002) is a Welsh professional footballer who plays as a defender for Swansea City. ==Club career== Rushesha made his Swansea City debut on 28 August 2019 as a second-half substitute in a 6–0 EFL Cup win against Cambridge United. ==International career== Rushesha was born in Zimbabwe, but he moved to the United Kingdom with his family in 2003. He has represented Wales at under-17's level. In October 2018 he played against Kazakhstan and Portugal in the 2019 UEFA European Under-17 Championship qualifiers. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Welsh footballers Category:Zimbabwean footballers Category:Swansea City A.F.C. players Category:Wales youth international footballers Category:Zimbabwean emigrants to the United Kingdom Category:Welsh people of Zimbabwean descent Category:Black Welsh sportspeople
title: Tivonge Rushesha
